tasks.label: retag-v1.0.2
args: git tag -d v0.9.1 2>$null; git push origin :refs/tags/v0.9.1 2>$null; git tag v1.0.2 -f; git push --tags --force-with-lease

tasks.label: cleanup-artifacts
args: Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .build.lock; Get-ChildItem tmp -Directory -Filter 'minimal-author-*' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'concurrent-*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'fuzz_*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'CLEANUP_DONE'

tasks.label: cleanup-pre-release
args: Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue .build.lock; Get-ChildItem tmp -Directory -Filter 'minimal-author-*' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'CLEANUP_STAGE_OK'

tasks.label: rebuild-after-init-diag
args: $env:MCP_FORCE_REBUILD='1'; npm run build:verify; npm run test:diag

tasks.label: diag-handshake-tests
args: $env:MCP_FORCE_REBUILD='1'; npm run build:verify; $env:MCP_HEALTH_MIXED_DIAG='1'; npx vitest run src/tests/handshakeFlakeRepro.spec.ts src/tests/healthMixedReproLoop.spec.ts --reporter=dot

tasks.label: cleanup-test-artifacts
args: Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter '*_17*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'gating_test_entry_*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'defaults_fill_*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'restart_persist_*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Get-ChildItem instructions -Filter 'import_gov_*.json' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host 'TEST_ARTIFACTS_CLEANED'

tasks.label: git-commit
args:
Repository maintenance: cleanup, version bump, enhanced .gitignore

- Enhanced .gitignore with comprehensive test artifact patterns (*_17*.json, gating_test_entry_*, defaults_fill_*, restart_persist_*, import_gov_*)
- Cleaned up test artifacts and temporary files from instructions/ directory
- Version bump from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4
- Added short-circuit mode (MCP_SHORTCIRCUIT=1) for minimal handshake testing
- Improved handshake ordering and reliability with fallback controls
- Enhanced rate limiting tests with better concurrency handling
- Added minimal standalone server for handshake verification
- Comprehensive test suite validation (154 tests passed)
